30  class CoreEvent
31  {
32  public:
33 
34  class Source {
35  public:
36  typedef enum
37  {
38  UNDEFINED,
39  DEVICE,
40  NODE
41  } Type;
42  Source(CoreEvent::Source::Type type) : _eventSourceType(type) {}
43  Source(Source& source) { _eventSourceType = source._eventSourceType; }
44  virtual ~Source() {}
45  virtual CoreEvent::Source::Type eventSourceType() const { return _eventSourceType; }
46  private:
47  CoreEvent::Source::Type _eventSourceType;
48  };
49 
50  typedef enum
51  {
52  NEW_SAMPLE,
53  ARRIVAL,
54  REMOVAL,
55  STILL,
56  FLUSH,
57  EXIT,
58  SUSPEND,
59  RESUME,
60  INIT_HOT_PLUG,
61  } Type;
62 
63  CoreEvent(CoreEvent::Type type, CoreEvent::Source *source = 0)
64  : _eventType(type)
65  , _eventSource(source)
66  {
67  }
68 
69  CoreEvent(CoreEvent& event)
70  : _eventType(event._eventType)
71  , _eventSource(event._eventSource) // FIXME: Can we just copy this pointer ?
72  {
73  }
74 
75  virtual ~CoreEvent()
76  {
77  }
78 
79  virtual Type type() const
80  {
81  return _eventType;
82  }
83 
84  virtual Source *source() const
85  {
86  return _eventSource;
87  }
88 
89  virtual void setType(Type type)
90  {
91  _eventType = type;
92  }
93 
94  private:
95  CoreEvent::Type _eventType;
96  CoreEvent::Source* _eventSource;
97  };
98  }
99 }
